name: Missing Tapes
description:
Missing Tape's is a collection of short horror stories made in PSX and VHS style. You can choose any of several scary stories, before getting a short description of where and under what circumstances the tape was found...  Management: WASD - movement; E - pick up an object; Q - throw; Features: 1.PSX-style graphics; 2.VHS effect; 3.Game Genre: "Found Footage Note: Only one story is available at the moment, but more will be added soon with a future update. 

Assets used: 

https://craigsnedeker.itch.io/classic64-asset-library

https://elbolilloduro.itch.io/paquete-de-modelos-psx-3
